name: EW4.MessageBubbles
author: Evelyn (ev_ynw)
description:
2 available versions. Applies in Messages.app.

Only themes the SHAPE of the bubbles. Coloring is done by other tweaks, e.g. Nord, ColorizeChat etc.

Apply with iThemer / Snowboard (with UI extension).

Installed to /Library/Themes

Need help? Link to tutorials in my pinned tweet
